description: Try our easy to follow Thai Grilled Pineapple & Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Grilled Pineapple & Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide salad between serving plates. Add sliced chicken and pineapple to the salad. Serve immediately.
